src_original: aśuddho 'śuddhaśuddho 'tha suviśuddho yathākramam /  sattvadhāturiti prokto bodhisattvastathāgataḥ // 47 //
tgt_original: 不淨眾生界，　　染中淨菩薩，

src_original: yathākramaṃ trināmanirdeśato nirdiṣṭā veditavyāḥ /  yadutāśuddhāvasthāyāṃ sattvadhāturiti /  aśuddhaśuddhāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattva iti /  suviśuddhāvasthāyāṃ tathāgata iti /
tgt_original: 復次此菩提心無差別相故，不淨位中名眾生界，於染淨位名為菩薩，最清淨位說名如來。

src_original: ayameva śāriputra dharmakāyo 'paryantakleśakośakoṭigūḍhaḥ /  saṃsārastrotasā uhmamāno 'navarāgrasaṃsāragaticyutyupapattiṣu saṃcaran sattvadhāturityucyate /
tgt_original: 即此法身為本際，無邊煩惱藏所纏，從無始來生死趣中生滅流轉，說名眾生界。 復次舍利弗！

src_original: sa eva śāriputra dharmakāyaḥ saṃsārastrotoduḥkhanirviṣṇo viraktaḥ sarvakāmaviṣayebhyo daśapāramitāntargataiścaturaśītyā (Rgv 41)  dharmaskandhasahasrairbodhāya caryā caran bodhisattva ityucyate /
tgt_original: 即此法身，厭離生死漂流之苦，捨於一切諸欲境界，於十波羅蜜及八萬四千法門中為求菩提而修諸行，說名菩薩。

src_original: ata evāvasthānirdeśānantaramāha /  tasmācchāriputra nānyaḥ sattvadhāturnānyo dharmakāyaḥ /

tgt_original: 如是老病死，　　不能燒法界。
復次云何於此現有生老死而言是常？ 譬如虛空，雖劫災火起，不能為害。

src_original: lokavyavahāra epa bhagavan mṛta iti vā jāta iti (Rgv 46) vā /  mṛta iti bhagavannindriyoparodha eṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 法界亦爾，是故經言「世尊！ 生死者但隨俗說有。

src_original: jāta iti bhagavan navānāmindriyāṇāṃ prādurbhāva eṣa /  na kṣunarbhagavaṃstathāgatagarbho jāyate vā jīryati vā mriyate vā cyavate votpadyate vā /  tatkasmāddheto /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 死者諸根隱沒，生者諸根新起，非如來藏有生老死若沒若起。

src_original: saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaviṣayavyativṛtto bhagavaṃstathāgatagarbho nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvata iti /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 如來藏過有為相，寂靜常住，不變不斷故。
